summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons administrative record listing inmates with pending disciplinary actions. It includes an entry for Jeffrey Epstein dated July 29, 2019, noting a pending DHO hearing for code 228 (self-mutilation) following a suicide attempt on July 23, 2019. The document also lists other inmates with various infractions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate with pending DHO hearing for code 228 (self-mutilation) following a suicide attempt on July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Lavell Edward Durant

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Suicide Attempt
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein attempted suicide in prison, documented as self-mutilation.

events.title: Contraband Recovery from Durant
events.description: During a visual search, staff recovered 3 yellow balloons inside Lavell Durant's underwear containing a brown leafy substance that tested negative.

events.title: DHO Sanction for Durant
events.description: Lavell Durant was sanctioned by a Discipline Hearing Officer for code 224 (assaulting with serious injury) and other infractions.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is documented with a pending DHO hearing for code 228 (self-mutilation) following a suicide attempt on July 23, 2019.
The document records Epstein's admission date to the facility as July 29, 2019, and his inmate register number as 78318-054.
Other inmates listed have pending disciplinary actions for various infractions including assault, possessing hazardous tools, and contraband possession.
The document is a Bureau of Prisons administrative record showing routine prison disciplinary tracking procedures.
